text: Ara amara rasulaganake patha'i na susambadadata o satarkakarirupe bhinna, ara yara abisbasa posana kare tara mithyara sahayye bitarka kare yena tara dbara tara satyake byartha karate pare, ara amara banisamuha o ya diye tadera satarka kara hayeche se-sabake tara bidrupera bisaya rupe grahana kare thake.
